content:
We have been lucky enough to have Bill Verplank teaching us for the past week or so. Its been great to talk to him although he’s one of those people that you just listen too I think!

He ran a course here at CIID called Motors & Music in which we explored haptic interfaces and music making. As you can imagine there was a great deal of excitement when it came time to make little projects to show off. There were explorations of all kinds from a kite flying simulator to a windup music box. Look out for the me and Harsha Vardhan’s project soon on the work page: Gone Fishin’!
